channel.title: [Project] Npcs interact with your reputation
channel.description:
ive started making this idea after i sucessfully made the npcs interact with snow if i ever get too complete it you guys will know :)
if you have a positive reputation the plans are you might get discount on goods quest will be different and the people of silabscape will be apathetic too you
[img]http://upload-image.com/image/Ltz17897.bmp[/img]
but if you have a negative reputation the locals will be rude too you shops might not sell you items and quest changes heres a screeny of the locals being rude:
[img]http://upload-image.com/image/cHq17988.bmp[/img]
heres what the npc says if you have 0 rep points for now this will change later but again im just starting with this
[img]http://upload-image.com/image/NUY18140.bmp[/img]
current news:
Got rep points too save in player files Got npc 393 too interact with the player when reputation was changed
project completion 10%

item.title: [Project] Npcs interact with your reputation
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

This could be a good idea, like for certain quests you can choose good or bad path, if you choose good, less reward but more rep (and more rep means lower prices in shops etc.) but if bad then you get better reward but less rep, or make a good and bad side thing, and if you go negative you become bad, and some quests you’ll HAVE to be bad to start em, I dunno

Read full topic

item.title: [Project] Npcs interact with your reputation
item.dc:creator: @Fasga Fasga
item.description:
@Fasga wrote:

How do you gain rep? Or do you just set it if you like someone :p. Anyway, I think it would be cool to be able to gain rep by doing quests for people or something. Is this in the latest Hybridscape? I think you really might be on to something

Read full topic
